Koga Shuko/Anubis/Serpentor/Hades/Sixshot/Unitron/Nemesis Enforcer:


Sixshot got blown in farther as more missiles hit him.  Transforming quickly, 
he rocketed off into the sky, bringing up a target lock and firing two 
missiles down at Perndabot.

---

Hades raised his launcher, firing a rocket off at Sniper, two optic blasts 
heading for Liono.

---

Unitron fell back as more shots hit him.  Raising his rifles, he fired a 
total of 8 lasers at Zardus, running off into the Ark, shields down.

---

Koga Shuko fired three optic blasts at Zardus, followed by a rocket from his 
missile launcher.

---

Serpentor walked over to a downed Sona.  Taking out his energon blade, he 
slashed the blade down at her neck, attempting to decapitate her.  

---

Nemesis howled, raising his rifle and firing twenty five shots across the 
battlefield.  Six bolts heading for Rhinox, three for Serpentor, four for 
Antagony,  two at Killer, and five at Liono.
